title: Inception
description: A thief who enters dreams to steal secrets gets a chance to redeem himself with one final mission.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham into chaos.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once more to undo Thanos' actions.

title: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general fights his way through the gladiatorial arena to seek vengeance.

title: Titanic
description: A young couple from different social classes fall in love aboard the ill-fated Titanic.

title: Joker
description: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck embarks on a downward spiral that leads to chaos.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The story of a simple man who witnesses and influences some of the most defining moments of the 20th century.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A young hobbit, Frodo, embarks on a perilous journey to destroy the One Ring and save Middle-earth.
